data.title: Blackjack hand points
data.statement:
Blackjack is a card game. The goal of the game is to get a hand with 21 points, or as close as possible, without ever exceeding 21 points.
Cards of rank 2 through 10 are valued according to their face value. Deuces are 2 points, treys are 3 points, etc. All face cards (jacks, queens and kings) are 10 points. Aces can be worth either 1 or 11 points. It is worth 11points unless the hand exceeds 21 points. in this case one ace worth 1.
Blackjack is the highest hand totaling 21 and is made of an Ace and any 10-point card.
The goal is to calculate the points of a hand.
data.constraints:
1 < [[n]] < 10
The card is a string containing its rank ({{2-10, J, Q, K or A}}) and its suit ({{S}} for spades, {{C}} for clubs, {{H}} for hearts, and {{D}} for diamonds).
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read p:string(3)
write result
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The number of cards in the hand [[n]].
<<[[n]] Lines:>> The card [[c]].
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> {{Blackjack}} If the hand is a Blackjack (one ace and a 10-point card), {{Bust}} if the hand has more than 21 points, or the points of the hand in the other case.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Blackjack is a card game. The goal of the game is to get a hand with 21 points, or as close as possible, without ever exceeding 21 points.
Cards of rank 2 through 10 are valued according to their face value. Deuces are 2 points, treys are 3 points, etc. All face cards (jacks, queens and kings) are 10 points. Aces can be worth either 1 or 11 points. It is worth 11points unless the hand exceeds 21 points. in this case one ace worth 1.
Blackjack is the highest hand totaling 21 and is made of an Ace and any 10-point card.
The goal is to calculate the points of a hand.
Input
Line 1: The number of cards in the hand n.
n Lines: The card c.
Output
Line 1: Blackjack If the hand is a Blackjack (one ace and a 10-point card), Bust if the hand has more than 21 points, or the points of the hand in the other case.
Constraints
1 < n < 10
The card is a string containing its rank (2-10, J, Q, K or A) and its suit (S for spades, C for clubs, H for hearts, and D for diamonds).
Example
Input
3
JS
2C
5H
Output
17 points
